name: Kill Them (EOShadows)
description:
It's simple.  You have to kill all of the enemies in the vicinity in order to progress to the next level.   It's easy - you can't even die in this game of elimination.  Just keep killing, because in this game, that's progress.

You can leave the game at any time while playing by pressing [ESC]

Made in around 24 hours for the Wowie Game Jam 3.0. 

WARNING: This game has flashing lights, and a bit of disturbing content.

Credits: 

Everything was made by me except for the non 8-bit audio and shaders.
